sidebarServices.bodyHtml: Html Instant is an easy to use online WYSIWYG (what you see is what you get HTML editor

dedicatedPageServices.bodyHtml: If you have a wrongly constructed HTML and need to make it valid, use Html Corrector, an HTML fixing online tool
If you need to quickly encode something into an HTML, use HTML Enc, an HTML encoder (and vice-versa)
If you need to quickly encode something into a URL, use URL Enc, a URL encoder (and vice-versa)
If you need to quickly generate a GUID, use GGuid, a configurable online tool for GUID generation
If you need to convert a binary or a text file to Base64, use 64 Baser, a Base64 encoder (and vice-versa)
If you need to convert a binary or a text file to Hex (Base16), use Hexator, a Hex (Base16) encoder (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in C or C++ code, use CEscaper to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in C# code, use C#Escaper to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in a JSON, use JsonEscaper online tool to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in Rust code, use RustEscaper online tool to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in Python code, use PythonEscaper online tool to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in JavaScript code, use JavaScriptEscaper online tool to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to escape a string to use in Java code, use JavaEscaper online tool to escape it (and vice-versa)
If you need to convert text notation (e.g. camelCase to snake_case), you can use Notationer, an online tool
